00030 class U_EXPORT UCrl {
00031 public:

00033         // Check for memory error

00038         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR

00044         UCrl(X509_CRL* _crl = 0) : crl(_crl)
00045                 {
00046                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCrl, "%p", _crl)
00047                 }
00048 
00057         static X509_CRL* readCRL(const UString& x, const char* format = 0);
00058 
00059         UCrl(const UString& x, const char* format = 0)
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCrl, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x), format)
00062 
00063                 crl = readCRL(x, format);
00064                 }
00065 
00070         void clear()
00071                 {
00072                 U_TRACE(1, "UCrl::clear()")
00073 
00074                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00075 
00076                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(X509_CRL_free, "%p", crl);
00077 
00078                 crl = 0;
00079                 }
00080 
00081         ~UCrl()
00082                 {
00083                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCrl)
00084 
00085                 if (crl) clear();
00086                 }
00087 
00088         // VARIE
00089 
00090         bool isValid() const
00091                 {
00092                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::isValid()")
00093 
00094                 U_RETURN(crl != 0);
00095                 }
00096 
00097         X509_CRL* getCrl() const { return crl; }
00098 
00099         bool isUpToDate() const;

00102                          unsigned getRevokedSerials(                                     long* revoked, unsigned sz) { return getRevokedSerials(crl, revoked, sz); }
00103 
00104         long hashCode() const
00105                 {
00106                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::hashCode()")
00107 
00108                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00109 
00110                 long hash = X509_NAME_hash(X509_CRL_get_issuer(crl));
00111 
00112                 U_RETURN(hash);
00113                 }
00114 
00115         static long getNumber(X509_CRL* crl);
00116                          long getNumber() const                         { return getNumber(crl); }
00117 
00122         static UString getFileName(X509_CRL* crl);
00123 
00124         UString getFileName() const { return getFileName(crl); }

00130         long getVersionNumber() const
00131                 {
00132                 U_TRACE(1, "UCrl::getVersionNumber()")
00133 
00134                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00135 
00136                 long version = U_SYSCALL(X509_CRL_get_version, "%p", crl);
00137 
00138                 U_RETURN(version);
00139                 }
00140 
00145         UString getSignature() const
00146                 {
00147                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::getSignature()")
00148 
00149                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00150 
00151                 UString signature( (const char*) crl->signature->data,
00152                                                                                                         crl->signature->length );
00153 
00154                 U_RETURN_STRING(signature);
00155                 }

00161         const char* getLastUpdate() const
00162                 {
00163                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::getLastUpdate()")
00164 
00165                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(crl)
00166

00168 
00169                 U_RETURN((const char*)utctime->data);

00214         static bool isEqual(X509_CRL* a, X509_CRL* b)
00215                 {
00216                 U_TRACE(0, "UCrl::isEqual(%p,%p)", a, b)
00217 
00218                 int rc = U_SYSCALL(X509_CRL_cmp, "%p,%p", a, b);
00219 
00220                 U_RETURN(rc == 0);
00221                 }
00222 
00223         bool operator==(const UCrl& c) const { return  isEqual(crl, c.crl); }
00224         bool operator!=(const UCrl& c) const { return !isEqual(crl, c.crl); }
